description: 1 if n is a Catalan number else 0.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = abs(sgn(n - sup((2*k)!/(k!*(k + 1)!))) - 1), for n - (2*k)!/(k!*(k + 1)!) >= 0. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 27 2015
maple: V:= Array(0..1000):for n from 1 doc:= binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1);  if c > 1000 then break fi;V[c]:= 1;od:convert(V,list); # _Robert Israel_, Oct 13 2015
mathematica: t = CatalanNumber@ Range@ 12; Table[Boole@ MemberQ[t, n], {n, 0, 96}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 29 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
